div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
VCCNEVaccineA Type of medicine that creates an immune protection without the recipient experiencing the disease.
Import all the codes that are contained in x_Medicine

description.value: A type of Manufactured Material that is administered to a living subject, either by a healthcare professional or auto-administered, within a healthcare context.
